$ZIM I'm not an expert but from what I read on the ZIM site the holder's of ordinary shares as of March 24th will receive the dividend. To be such one must be recorded by that date T2 which would be and owner as of  March 22nd. It takes 2 days to settle an account and be recorded as the owner. I could be wrong.
$ZIM 2022 Dividends
In accordance with the Company's dividend policy

column3: or $6.40 per ordinary share. Together with prior dividend distributions made on account of 2022
column4: dividend distributions for the year totaled approximately 44% of the year's net income. The dividend will be paid on April 3
column6: to holders of ZIM ordinary shares as of March 24
column7: 2023. Since the foregoing declared dividend amount per share constitutes more than 25% of the Company's ordinary share price on the declaration date (March 13
column9: per the instructions of the NYSE
column10: the ex-dividend date with respect to this dividend distribution will be April 4
column11: 2023. Shareholders who wish to receive the dividend must hold their ZIM shares until the ex-dividend date.
